title: Pulcinella and the magic fish
brief_description: An animated story about a man and a woman and the demands they make on a magic fish for material possessions. The fish initially satisfies their wishes but finally takes their grand palace and possessions away. No other credits available.
description: An animated story about a man and a woman and the demands they make on a magic fish for material possessions. The fish initially satisfies their wishes but finally takes their grand palace and possessions away. No other credits available.
